thread.title: Great hotel with perfect location
thread.title_full: Great hotel with perfect location - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KJ2860
title: Great hotel with perfect location
text:
Stayed for two nights and had a quite small room on the 5th floor. The romm was clean, quiet and had everything you'd expect.
The staff was friendly and helpfull. Would definitely recommend a stay here.
Room Tip: 3 minute walk from the Eiffel Tower (and 10 sec. to the Metro) See more room tips
